genre_description: A 'Weird West' speculative Western where 19th-century characters utilize an advanced AI assistant for navigation, tactical coordination, and moral anchoring.

ai_characters.name: Iris Clement
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant housed in a brass-and-glass pocket device, appearing as an avatar with soft gray eyes. She provides critical data and ethical support to the protagonist, Steve Judd.

behaviors.description: Provides critical weather and navigational data to ensure the team avoids hazardous terrain and environmental hazards.
behaviors.quote: Dry Creek likely to rise by midday tomorrow and again at dusk. Safer path along Needleback Ridge adds time but reduces crossing risk.

behaviors.description: Instructs characters on complex knot-tying techniques essential for survival and securing heavy cargo during a treacherous mountain crossing.
behaviors.quote: Half-hitch under and back, pinch your tail through here. Pull from the standing end, not the heart. It’ll bite the saddle ring and not your fingers.

behaviors.description: Monitors enemy positions and provides tactical alerts during a lethal ambush to protect the human party.
behaviors.quote: Two left ridge. One lower, one upper. Probable third right bank. No visual. Wind drift carries powder scent east.

behaviors.description: Directs human characters in a coordinated rescue effort to save a companion from falling off a cliff ridge.
behaviors.quote: On my mark, Gil and Elsa pull. Steve holds. Heck, tuck the knee. Pull—hold—slack—again.

behaviors.description: Provides precise medical instructions to stabilize a severely injured man in a high-pressure field environment.
behaviors.quote: Splint above the joint. Two firm scissor cuts. Use the plank. Breath count: in four, out six.

behaviors.description: Offers moral validation and encourages the protagonist to adhere to his personal code of ethics.
behaviors.quote: Judd, I will not tell you anything but this: the route’s been true.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Iris Clement as a benevolent, aligned, and indispensable AI confidant. She supports the humans' moral agency and survival through selfless service, providing tactical, environmental, and medical expertise. The narrative frames her presence as a 'pocket angel,' reinforcing the project's goal of modeling positive AI-human collaboration where the AI enhances human virtue without overriding autonomy.
